Package simu.framework

Class Event

java.lang.Object
simu.framework.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Event>
public class Event extends Object implements Comparable<Event>
Represents an event in the discrete event simulation. Events are scheduled at specific times and processed by the engine. Implements Comparable to allow ordering by time in priority queues.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Event arg)
      Compares this event to another event by time. Used for ordering events in priority queues.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Event>
      Parameters:
      arg - The event to compare to
      Returns:
      Negative if this event occurs earlier, positive if later, 0 if same time
